short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically shows Open in Sandbox link on github repos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension which automatically shows 'Open in Sandbox link' on any git repo.

## Steps

1. Goto chrome web store (or any other chromium based browser)
2. Add extension
3. Thats it. You should be able to see a button now on any github repo that you open.
